# inputImageFeatureName

**Instance Property**

The name of the feature value that Vision sets from the request handler.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImageFeatureName: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, Vision uses the first input found, but you can manually set that input to another [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNCoreMLFeatureValueObservation/featureName] instead.

## Providing Features

- **featureProvider**: An optional object to support inputs outside Vision.

items.description: An optional object to support inputs outside Vision.
